abstract: Profit in the second quarter rose 65 percent on improving output in the United States, but the company said sanctions against Russia were a concern.
snippet: Profit in the second quarter rose 65 percent on improving output in the United States, but the company said sanctions against Russia were a concern.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — BP showed clear signs in reporting earnings on Tuesday that its once-lucrative business in the United States was recovering from the Gulf of Mexico oil spill of 2010. But the oil company also indicated that its large investment in Russia was growing riskier as  economic sanctions against Russia escalated.

headline.main: BP Profit Rises, but It Warns of Risks in Russia
headline.print_headline: BP Warns of Risks as Profit Rises
